task: Add or edit a title page
steps: Open the Microsoft Word document Document11.docx.
Navigate to the beginning of the document.
Insert a new page by pressing Ctrl + Enter.
On the new page, type the title of the document.
Format the title as desired, such as changing the font, size, or color.
Add any additional information to the title page, such as the author's name or date.
Save the document to apply the changes.
